ActivityDeclaration.Name: Multiphases Initialization of Capella DiffMerge From Scope

mapping.description: A multi phases system to subsystem transition
A multi phases system to subsystem transition
A multi phases system to subsystem transition

constraint.name: HW_01
constraint.description: Checks if allocation of Logical Functions, realizing System Functions, in Logical Components are different than the associated pre-allocation links.

constraint.name: HW_02
constraint.description: Checks if deployment of Behavioural Components, realizing Logical Components, in Physical Node Components are different than the associated pre-allocation links.

constraint.name: HW_03
constraint.description: Checks if allocation of Logical Functional Exchanges, realizing System Functional Exchanges, in Logical Component Exchanges are different than the associated pre-allocation links.

constraint.name: HW_04
constraint.description: Checks if allocation of Component Exchanges, realizing Logical Component Exchanges, in Physical Links in the Physical Architecture phase are different than the associated pre-allocation links.
